name: Reasoning Models
description: Advanced AI models that use chain-of-thought reasoning to solve complex problems step-by-step, including OpenAI o-series, DeepSeek R1, and similar architectures.

name: Model Router
description: Microsoft Foundry's automatic model selection service that optimizes for cost and performance by routing requests to the most appropriate model.

name: AI Red Teaming
description: Security testing methodology for AI systems using adversarial techniques to identify vulnerabilities and ensure safe, responsible AI deployment.

name: Edge AI
description: Deploying and running AI models locally or at the edge for improved privacy, reduced latency, and offline capabilities.

name: LangChain
description: Framework for developing applications powered by language models, enabling chaining, agents, and complex workflows.

name: Microsoft Foundry
description: Microsoft's comprehensive AI development platform offering model catalog, deployment, evaluation, and monitoring capabilities.

name: GitHub Models
description: GitHub's model marketplace and playground for exploring, testing, and deploying AI models directly from the GitHub interface.

name: Multimodal Models
description: AI models that can process and generate multiple types of data including text, images, audio, and video.

name: Responsible AI
description: Principles and practices for developing AI systems that are safe, fair, transparent, and accountable.

name: DeepSeek
description: Family of open-source models including DeepSeek V3 and DeepSeek R1, known for cost-effectiveness and strong performance.
